summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Eastlake Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from East Howe Street to East Lynn Street, by constructing sewers therein, of proper dimensions and material, together with all necessary wyes, openings, catch basins, man holes, lampholes, flush tanks, and other appurtenances, in accordance with Resolution No. 562 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
